law.text: There shall be a provision as follows: "Physical Examination and Autopsy: The insurer, at its own expense, shall have the right and opportunity to examine the person of the insured when and as often as it may reasonably require during the pendency of a claim hereunder and to make an autopsy in case of death where it is not forbidden by law."
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 17, sec. 14, effective June 18, 1970.
